sentences.en: a room of one's own.
sentences.cn: 自己的一个房间

sentences.en: Adults need to live their own lives and that's difficult with children.
sentences.cn: 大人需要过他们自己的生活，但有了孩子就很难做到了。

sentences.en: at last I've got a place of my own.
sentences.cn: 我终于有了自己的住所了。

sentences.en: Bring your own equipment.
sentences.cn: 带上你自己的装备。

sentences.en: Cabinet Ministers are selfishly pursuing their own vested interests.
sentences.cn: 内阁大臣们正在自私地追逐他们自己的既得利益。

sentences.en: Every dance has its own rhythm.
sentences.cn: 每一种舞蹈都有自己的节奏。

sentences.en: Generosity is its own form of power.
sentences.cn: 别低估了慷慨的力量。

sentences.en: he &B{owns up} to few mistakes.
sentences.cn: 他只承认了很少的错误。

sentences.en: He is now out of college and on his own.
sentences.cn: 他现在离开了大学并且自己生活

sentences.en: He kept encouraging Rosie to find a place of her own.
sentences.cn: 他不断鼓励罗茜为自己找个住处。

sentences.en: He rode on the president's luxury train through his own state.
sentences.cn: 他乘坐总统的豪华列车经过自己所在的州。

sentences.en: He saw the Major's face a few inches from his own.
sentences.cn: 他看见少校的脸离他自己的只有几英寸.

sentences.en: He's like some dreamy kid playing on his own.
sentences.cn: 他就像是个自娱自乐的爱幻想的孩子。

sentences.en: Her aggressiveness made it difficult for him to explain his own feelings.
sentences.cn: 她咄咄逼人的态度让他难以解释自己的感情。

sentences.en: His face was only a few inches from her own.
sentences.cn: 他的脸离她自己的脸非常近。

sentences.en: Its own estimate of three hundred tallies with that of another survey.
sentences.cn: 其估计数目300与另一项调查的结果相吻合。

sentences.en: Many more people now own their own homes.
sentences.cn: 现在更多的人拥有了自己的住房。

sentences.en: On her own ground she knows exactly what she's doing.
sentences.cn: 她在自己熟悉的领域里对自己的行为有十足的把握。

sentences.en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentences.cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentences.en: She got the job on her own.
sentences.cn: 她自己找到了这份工作

sentences.en: She noticed her own proud walk had become a shuffle.
sentences.cn: 她意识到自己趾高气扬的步伐已变成了拖着脚走路了。

sentences.en: She won a grant to develop her own business.
sentences.cn: 她赢得了一笔拨款，用以扩展自己的企业。

sentences.en: The building is owned by the local council.
sentences.cn: 这幢大楼归地方议会所有。

sentences.en: the cost of owning a car
sentences.cn: 养车的开销

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: the two folk languages will at last come into their own.
sentences.cn: 这两种部落语言最终将大行其道。

sentences.en: The yacht was intended for the King’s own personal use.
sentences.cn: 这艘游艇是专供国王私用的。

sentences.en: Would Bethany return of her own free will, as she had promised?
sentences.cn: 贝萨妮会像她承诺的那样自愿回来吗？

sentences.en: You need to get permission from the farmer who owns the land.
sentences.cn: 你要得到拥有这块土地的农场主同意。

phrases.phrase: as if (或 like) one owns the place
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)俨然那地方是他的（表示态度专横和妄自尊大）
充分发挥作用，被充分使用；被充分认可
拥有：完完全全属于某人自己
他自己的；属于他自己的
靠自己的力量，独立地：自己对自己负责；独立于外来的帮助或控制之外
靠自己；独自一人；一己之力
独自地；独立地；不依靠别人帮助地
凭自己的力量，他们自己；静静独处
自有品牌；使用自己商标的商品
影响本身利益的错误行为；[足球]误中本队球门
接受、承认个人的真实情感

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something belongs to or is connected with a particular person or thing and not any other
used to emphasize that something belongs to or is connected with a particular person or thing and not any other
to have something which belongs to you, especially because you have bought it, been given it etc and it is legally yours
to have something which belongs to you, especially because you have bought it, been given it etc and it is legally yours
